name: SigmaGrid
description: Institutional fair value and alpha signals for crypto synthetic equity perpetuals. Provides 24/7 fair value when traditional markets are closed.

authentication.description: Pay-per-request via x402 protocol. Free endpoints require no payment. Paid endpoints return HTTP 402 with payment instructions. Pay with USDC on Base L2.

tools.name: healthz
tools.description: Check if the SigmaGrid API is online and healthy. Returns status, service name, and uptime.

tools.name: validate
tools.description: Get list of supported assets, venues, and service status. Use this first to discover available tickers.

tools.name: signals_teaser
tools.description: Get free regime state and event-risk labels for a ticker. Returns risk_on/risk_off/transitioning regime and low/medium/high event risk. No numeric data. Use this to decide whether to query paid endpoints.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Asset ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, QQQ, TSLA, NVDA, AAPL)

tools.name: fair_value
tools.description: Get institutional fair value estimate for a ticker. Returns fair value price, source methodology, confidence score, and per-venue premium-to-close in basis points.

tools.name: premium
tools.description: Get cross-venue mispricing data. Returns per-venue premiums/discounts vs fair value and spread summary. Use to identify which venue has the best price.

tools.name: spread
tools.description: Get cross-venue spread analysis. Returns cheapest/richest venue, max spread in basis points, and arbitrage flag. Use for cross-venue arbitrage detection.

tools.name: funding
tools.description: Get funding rate data (Hyperliquid only). Returns current funding rate, z-score, anomaly flags, and mean-reversion probability.

tools.name: regime
tools.description: Get market regime classification. Returns risk_on/risk_off/transitioning with VIX context, confidence, and vol forecast.

tools.name: event_risk
tools.description: Get earnings event-risk assessment. Returns risk level, hours until next event, and historical average move percentage.

tools.name: events
tools.description: Get event sensitivity data. Returns next scheduled event, expected impact, directional bias, and risk level.

tools.name: arbitrage
tools.description: Get per-venue premiums and funding rates for arbitrage detection. Identifies cross-venue price discrepancies.

tools.name: alpha_snapshot
tools.description: Get the full AlphaSnapshot â€” every signal column for one ticker in a single response. This is the richest endpoint: fair value, premiums, regime, funding, events, drift, vol forecast, all in one call.

tools.name: historical
tools.description: Get historical time-series data. Returns fair value, regime, drift, and premiums over time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of data points to return

tools.name: snapshot
tools.description: Get a multi-ticker dashboard snapshot in a single request. Returns key metrics for all specified tickers.

tools.name: alpha_snapshot_batch
tools.description: Get full AlphaSnapshot for multiple tickers in one request. Returns every signal column for each ticker.
